## type [Config](<https://github.com/brittonhayes/pillager/blob/main/pkg/hunter/config.go#L22-L33>)

Config takes all of the configurable parameters for a Hunter\.

```go
type Config struct {
    Filesystem afero.Fs
    Reporter   format.Reporter
    Gitleaks   config.Config

    ScanPath string
    Verbose  bool
    Redact   bool
    Debug    bool
    Workers  int
    Template string
}
```
